notes.title: Funding
notes.p: The funding for this study was availed by KEMRI Internal Research Grants (IRG) which was awarded to Ms. Joyce Ondicho- PI and Dr. Peter Mwitari- Co-PI during the financial year 2016/2017. The award number was IRG/172/6. KEMRI Internal Research Grants provided the funds for the facilitation of the collection of plant materials and the provision of all the consumables utilized during this study.
